tasks.label: 📚 Publish Spike Editor
📚 Publish Spike Editor
args: if (!(Test-Path 'docs')) { mkdir docs }; Copy-Item 'index.html' 'docs/index.html' -Force; git add .; git commit -m 'Publish-Spike-Editor'; git push origin main; Write-Host '✅ Published!' -ForegroundColor Green

Write-Host '🚀 Publishing Spike Editor to GitHub Pages...' -ForegroundColor Green; if (!(Test-Path 'docs')) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path 'docs' | Out-Null; Write-Host '📁 Created docs directory' -ForegroundColor Yellow }; Copy-Item 'index.html' 'docs\index.html' -Force; Write-Host '📋 Copied index.html to docs/' -ForegroundColor Cyan; git add .; $status = git status --porcelain; if ($status) { git commit -m 'Publish-Updated-Spike-Editor'; git push origin main; Write-Host '✅ Published to GitHub!' -ForegroundColor Green; Write-Host '🌐 Your site will be available at:' -ForegroundColor Magenta; Write-Host 'https://edking21.github.io/Spike-Editor/' -ForegroundColor Blue; Write-Host '📋 Copy this URL to embed in Google Sites' -ForegroundColor Yellow; Start-Process 'https://sites.google.com' } else { Write-Host '⚠️  No changes to publish' -ForegroundColor Yellow }
